item.title: Office Chair
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description: • Back solid rod frame with Hq back mesh • High quality fixed arm rest • Hevy tilting mecanism with standerd lock • 12 mm ply wood seat with moulded foam & Hq fabric seat • Class 4 Gas lift • Metal /chrome/ Nylon Base with wheel
